data.message:
My mom said you look now, more like a man.. Well, I never ever thought you look like a lady, at all! You´re the most beautiful man in the world shaved, and you´re the most beutiful man in the world with a beard.. In both ways you make me wanna kiss you for hours and hours... Cause I don´t get tired of dreaming about you...                                                           
<3 I Love You, Em with a beard <3
